医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
气候变化将使低收入国家的海鲜营养成分减少 30% UBC 的最新研究表明，由于气候变化，到本世纪末，低收入国家从海鲜中获取的营养物质可能会减少 30%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Climate-change-to-slash-seafood- Nutritions-by-3025-in-low-venue-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Climate-change-to-slash-seafood- Nutritions-by-3025-in-low-venue-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e38949a5-61ef-4151-b4f0-62525bd6fffe Mon, 30 Oct 2023 21:30:58 -0400 Climate change to slash seafood nutrients by 30% in low-income countries
科学家确定酒精戒断性头痛的机制全球约有 2.83 亿人患有酒精使用障碍，这是一种使人衰弱的健康挑战，可用的治疗选择有限。据估计，每年给社会造成的损失超过 2 万亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Scientists-identify-mechanism-of-alcohol-withdrawal-headaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Scientists-identify-mechanism-of-alcohol-withdrawal-headaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d828a725-7b1b-4e23-9474-59cc59386ec3 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 21:25:07 -0400 Scientists identify mechanism of alcohol withdrawal headaches
身体欣赏信息可以抵消客观化健身影响者图像的负面影响华盛顿州立大学的一项研究表明，几句关于身体欣赏的话语可以帮助抵消观看女性健身影响者的客观化图像的负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Body-appreciation-messages-can-offset-negative-impact-of-objectified-fitness-influencer-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Body-appreciation-messages-can-offset-negative-impact-of-objectified-fitness-influencer-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b06650ca-daa3-449c-83f1-04c01acb162b Mon, 30 Oct 2023 21:00:56 -0400 Body appreciation messages can offset negative impact of objectified fitness influencer images
抗磷脂综合征的新分类标准APS 是一种与持久性抗磷脂抗体 (aPL) 相关的系统性自身免疫性疾病。它可导致血栓形成和妊娠并发症以及非血栓性表现，例如心脏瓣膜疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-classification-criteria-for-anti磷脂-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-classification-criteria-for-anti磷脂-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=136cc73f-05f1-4271-92fb-5a0f2a1e7244 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 20:52:20 -0400 New classification criteria for antiphospholipid syndrome
丹麦新研究表明，全谷物可以促进孩子的心脏健康8-13 岁丹麦儿童的全麦饮食显示，低密度脂蛋白胆固醇和三酰甘油水平显着降低，还促进有益肠道微生物群的生长。该研究强调了全谷物对早期心血管和肠道健康的益处，为儿童营养的进一步研究铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Wholegrains-give-kids-a-heart-healthy-boost-says-new-Danish-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Wholegrains-give-kids-a-heart-healthy-boost-says-new-Danish-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aaec347f-72eb-4668-85f9-c1fa56f329f5 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 20:17:00 -0400 Wholegrains give kids a heart-healthy boost, says new Danish study
确认新冠病毒人传狮子：新加坡研究为濒危物种敲响警钟该研究表明，SARS-CoV-2 delta 变种是从人类传播给新加坡动物园的狮子的，这强调了圈养和濒危动物面临的风险。研究人员呼吁采取严格的感染控制措施，并建议对易感动物进行疫苗接种，以保护它们免受人为病毒传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Human-to-lion-COVID-transmission-confirmed-Singapore-study-rings-alarm-bells-for-endangered-species.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Human-to-lion-COVID-transmission-confirmed-Singapore-study-rings-alarm-bells-for-endangered-species.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d7825ce-193d-4cb2-8e5d-0c167b0c05ec Mon, 30 Oct 2023 19:48:00 -0400 Human-to-lion COVID transmission confirmed: Singapore study rings alarm bells for endangered species
研究警告称，到本世纪中叶，极端高温将使与心脏相关的死亡人数增加一倍甚至三倍美国心脏协会期刊《循环》的新研究警告说，到本世纪中叶，美国因极端高温导致的心血管死亡人数可能会增加一倍以上。如果不减少温室气体排放，数字可能会增加两倍，老年人和非西班牙裔黑人成年人面临的风险要高得多。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Extreme-heat-set-to-double-or-even-triple-heart-lated-deaths-by-mid- century-study-warns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Extreme-heat-set-to-double-or-even-triple-heart-lated-deaths-by-mid- century-study-warns.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cd51949-4f32-4db1-8bb3-a7760989181f Mon, 30 Oct 2023 18:37:00 -0400 Extreme heat set to double, or even triple, heart-related deaths by mid-century, study warns
增强老年人的深度睡眠可以预防痴呆症一项研究表明，对于 60 岁以上的人来说，每年深度睡眠减少 1%，患痴呆症的风险就会增加 27%，该研究表明，增强或维持深度睡眠（也称为慢波睡眠），年长时可以预防痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Enhancing-deep-sleep-in-older-years-could-stave-off-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Enhancing-deep-sleep-in-older-years-could-stave-off-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec4d0b39-d3fb-402f-aa1d-6319cfb06bb5 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 15:22:30 -0400 Enhancing deep sleep in older years could stave off dementia
俄亥俄大学科学家获​​得 180 万美元资金建立研究中心，以解决环境压力因素对儿童健康的影响俄勒冈大学的研究人员获得了美国环境保护署的 180 万美元拨款，用于建立一个研究中心，以解决农业和非化学品接触对儿童的累积健康影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/OU-scientists-receive-2418-million-to-built-research-center-to-address-childrens-health-impacts-from-environmental-stressors。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/OU-scientists-receive-2418-million-to-built-research-center-to-address-childrens-health-impacts-from-environmental-stressors。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a00c3f0c-dc21-4607-a326-478843bd8ecb Mon, 30 Oct 2023 15:15:11 -0400 OU scientists receive $1.8 million to establish research center to address children's health impacts from environmental stressors
研究揭示了更精确、更持久、毒性更低的癌症治疗新方法长期以来，癌症治疗一直是一把双刃剑——旨在杀死癌细胞的治疗方法也常常对健康细胞造成严重破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Study-unveils-new-approach-to-more-precise-long- permanent-and-less-毒-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Study-unveils-new-approach-to-more-precise-long- permanent-and-less-毒-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b517fdcb-e16e-4454-b1ad-eb8c7a3bde20 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 15:10:46 -0400 Study unveils new approach to more precise, long-lasting, and less toxic cancer treatment
